statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT research_data, access_control FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encryption_key FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, research_data FROM sensitive_information ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, research_data FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encryption_key, access_control FROM sensitive_information WHERE research_data LIKE '%medical%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL AND access_control = 'admin' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT research_data, encryption_key FROM sensitive_information WHERE research_data NOT LIKE '%confidential' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT id, access_control FROM sensitive_information WHERE access_control IN ('user','admin') ORDER BY access_control, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT title, content FROM research_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, created_at FROM research_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM access_control WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_data ORDER BY created_at DESC, title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title FROM research_data WHERE owner = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content FROM research_data WHERE owner = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_data JOIN access_control ON research_data.owner = access_control.role_id WHERE access_control.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM research_data WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects;
SELECT record_name, record_data FROM DataRecords WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area, encryption_key FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_manager = 3 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers JOIN DataRecords ON Researchers.researcher_id = DataRecords.researcher_id WHERE record_id = 1001 ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM Projects JOIN DataRecords ON Projects.project_id = DataRecords.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING num_records >= 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;

SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM Projects JOIN Researchers ON Projects.project_manager = Researchers.researcher_id WHERE project_name LIKE '%Research%' AND researcher_id > 5 ORDER BY project_name ASC, researcher_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_owner DESC;
SELECT project_description, project_owner FROM research_projects WHERE project_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, project_owner, encryption_key FROM research_projects WHERE project_owner LIKE 'S%';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE project_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_owner DESC, project_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, research_role FROM researchers WHERE access_level='Admin' AND encrypted_password IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_name, project_id, encryption_key FROM research_projects WHERE project_owner='John Doe' OR project_owner='Jane Smith'
SELECT researcher_name, research_role, encrypted_password FROM researchers WHERE access_level='User' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensitive_research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM sensitive_research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM research_logs ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, data_encryption_key FROM sensitive_research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM sensitive_research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%Security%';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM sensitive_research_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, data_encryption_key FROM sensitive_research_data WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM research_logs ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, researcher_id, action_description FROM research_access_audit ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
